data.event: The pub, on Kings Street, will hold a business quiz tomorrow, a karaoke night on Thursday, the Pink Party on Friday or the barbecue and a table top sale that will take place on Sunday to support charities including the British Heart Foundation, The CF Trust, Cancer Research UK and Shooting Stars Children Hospice.

data.event: The pub, on Kings Street, will hold a business quiz tomorrow, a karaoke night on Thursday, the Pink Party on Friday or the barbecue and a table top sale that will take place on Sunday to support charities including the British Heart Foundation, The CF Trust, Cancer Research UK and Shooting Stars Children Hospice.
